attributes.action: Stop the planned Islamic centre in Keighley town centre and the potential for cultural clashes given its proximity to two public houses
attributes.additional_details:
This is an E-petition to raise awareness to potential cultural flash point that a Islamic Religious education centre will create in Keighley ,West Yorkshire given its proximity to two popular local public houses.

The two public houses in question being the Royal Oak and Albert.

The planning permission has recently just been granted after appeal due to the project initially hitting buffers due to local business and resident concerns in the immediate area.
